Package de.sub.goobi.metadaten.copier

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComposeFormattedRule
    Data copy rule that either overwrites the metadata described by the selector on the left hand side or creates it anew, if it isn’t yet present.
    CopierData
    A CopierData object contains all the data the data copier has access to.
    CopyIfMetadataIsAbsentRule
    The CopyIfMetadataIsAbsentRule defines that a metadata is copied right to left in case that the structure node defined on the left exists but doesn’t yet have a metadata as named.
    DataCopier
    A data copier is a class that can be parametrised to copy data in goobi processes depending on rules.
    DataCopyrule
    The abstract class DataCopyrule defines method signatures to implement a rule which may later be used to modify metadata depending on various conditions, and provides a factory method to create the matching metadata copy rule implementation from a given command string.
    DataSelector
    A DataSelector is useful to access a data object.
    DestinationReferenceSelector
    A DestinationReferenceSelector provides methods to retrieve document structure nodes relative to the respective document structure that the result of the operation shall be written to for reading from them.
    LocalMetadataSelector
    A LocalMetadataSelector provides methods to retrieve or modify metadata on a document structure node.
    MetadataPathSelector
    A MetadataPathSelector provides methods to retrieve or modify document structure nodes on a document structure node.
    MetadataSelector
    Abstract base class that different types of metadata selectors are based on.
    OverwriteOrCreateRule
    Data copy rule that either overwrites the metadatum described by the selector on the left hand side or creates it anew, if it isn’t yet present.
    StringSelector
    A string selector will always return the string used to create it.
    VariableSelector
    A VariableSelector provides methods to retrieve variables used in Goobi.
